item.title: About
item.description: Sup, The name’s Chandra. Link to heading I’m a beginner coding enthusiast, long-time Linux user, and student. When not writing code, I enjoy drawing. UI / UX designing has recently piqued my interest. Welcome aboard travellor, for this is gonna be one long journey.
